issue.title: [Python] Enable Parquet read/write to work with HDFS file objects
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-236](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-236). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will also involve a little bit of refactoring. Follow up to ARROW-222.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-236?focusedCommentId=15373266) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Narrowed scope slightly as reading from Python file objects depends on ARROW-228

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-236?focusedCommentId=15384895) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 104
